item.description:
Hi Everyone -

Sandy, of the The Boston/Providence Single Parents Meetup Group, & Sandra, of the Boston Divroce Support Group are trying to team up to see if can't meet some new people --

Saturday, February 17

6:30 pm

KINGS back Bay
Bowling Billiards & Lounge
10 Scotia St
Boston, MA 02115
http://www.kingsbackb...
(617) 266-2695

Adults only.

************* UPDATE **************
In order for us to get first priority on lanes, we will have dinner at the restaurant in advance. For menu pricing, please visit the Kings website listed above. The maximum number for our reservation can be 15, so please make sure that you are serious about coming to dinner if you RSVP "YES" (remember.."no shows..are a "no no"). If you need to update your RSVP, please do so today, so you do not take a spot that someone may want. Please update "Maybe" RSVP's to a "YES" or "NO' by 2/11.

Please also let me know if you'll be joingin just for bowling (there is also pool and lounge!) after dinner -- about 8ish and later.

Bowling is $6.50/pp, per game. Shoe rental is $4.00/pp

Join us for a fun evening of Dinner, Bowling & Billiards at Kings in Boston! This exciting venue, located in the Back-Bay, offers 10-pin bowling, billiards, a lounge and a full-service restaurant.

For those of you not familiar with KINGS it is right next to Summer Shack and has pool and groovy lounge as well.

If you are a member of more than one of these groups, to only RSVP on one group site.

I know it's holiday weekend, so if you're around please come by.
Thanks!
Tess

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Bowling at Kings - 3 groups in 1 night!
